name.description: Specifies the name of the Application Insights WebTest. Changing this forces a

application_insights_id.description: The ID of the Application Insights component on which the WebTest operates. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The location of the resource group.

kind.description: The kind of web test that this web test watches. Choices are `ping` and `multistep`.

geo_locations.description: A list of where to physically run the tests from to give global coverage for accessibility of your application.

configuration.description: An XML configuration specification for a WebTest.

frequency.description: Interval in seconds between test runs for this WebTest. Default is `300`.

timeout.description: Seconds until this WebTest will timeout and fail. Default is `30`.

enabled.description: Is the test actively being monitored.

retry_enabled.description: Allow for retries should this WebTest fail.

description.description: Purpose/user defined descriptive test for this WebTest.
